Really enjoyable, I regret sleeping on the Portal games for as long as I did. 10/10 highly recommend!

My review is spoiler free!

Absolutely love Portal 2,  I also love Portal, but Portal 2 has all the good game mechanics, and not the energy pellets! The engine is newer, and as of a the past few weeks the game has become a decade old, and yet Valve is still patching it. There were issues with the perpetual testing initiative that were fixed with this. I love how mod-able Portal 2 is, and additionally love the lack of a need to mod for single chambers that can be posted on the workshop. Must play "Into the Multiverse" series on there.

I really love this game mainly because of the funny characters and cool world building. The puzzles can get pretty challenging towards the end, but they never felt impossible.

If you enjoyed Portal, Portal 2 will CERTAINLY be a big hit for you! Portal 2 has all of Portal's puzzle challenge while introducing you to more characters and witty humor. I instantly was enamored by the beauty of the game-- from lovable character personalities to even more puzzle mechanics and areas to explore, Portal 2 definitely is a worthy successor to the original game.

Oh, and if you're one who prefers to solve things with friends, I'd say the co-op mode is definitely a fun thing to try out!

You will not regret playing this game.
